repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

comment_data.body:
This doesn't return anything in this path.

I'd take this change out of the PR (and possibly propose it separately if it's likely to be useful)
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -2047,12 +2047,18 @@ def tearDown(self):
         os.chdir(self.old_dir)
 
     def _try_decode(self, content):
-        if not isinstance(content, bytes):
-            return content
-        try:
-            return content.decode()
-        except UnicodeDecodeError:
-            return content.decode('iso-8859-1')
+        if IS_PY2:
+            if isinstance(content, bytes):
+                return content
+            else:
+                content.encode(errors='replace')

comment_data.body: No this change has only debug purpose. It is removed from PR now...
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -2047,12 +2047,18 @@ def tearDown(self):
         os.chdir(self.old_dir)
 
     def _try_decode(self, content):
-        if not isinstance(content, bytes):
-            return content
-        try:
-            return content.decode()
-        except UnicodeDecodeError:
-            return content.decode('iso-8859-1')
+        if IS_PY2:
+            if isinstance(content, bytes):
+                return content
+            else:
+                content.encode(errors='replace')

commit.message:
Do not set exception_check if already set during analyzing pxd file (#6124)

Co-authored-by: da-woods <dw-git@d-woods.co.uk>

Revert "Workaround encode/decode errors"

This reverts commit ab46e700195b243fcbf101d3681c274a23fffe48.

title: [3.0] Do not set exception_check if already set during analyzing pxd file
